title: WaveSpeed AI - Transform Facial Expressions in Images Instantly

hero.heading: Transform Facial Expressions in Photos
hero.description: Enter your prompt to modify facial expressions in images automatically and creatively.

prompt.heading: Prompt
prompt.placeholder: E.g., Change the smile to a frown, add excitement to the face, make the expression more serious...

examples.heading: Before & After Examples
examples.description: Discover how WaveSpeed AI can enhance emotions in your photos with astonishing accuracy.

features.heading: Why Choose WaveSpeed AI?
features.description: Our cutting-edge technology provides effortless and stunning expression modifications.

items.title: Instant Results
items.description: Achieve stunning changes in seconds, with our advanced AI models tackling complex expression transfers.

items.title: User-Friendly
items.description: No expertise needed. Just upload your image and let our AI enhance the expressions for you.

items.title: Privacy Oriented
items.description: Your images are processed locally and securely in your browser without leaving your device.

howItWorks.heading: How It Works
howItWorks.description: Three simple steps to modify expressions effortlessly

items.title: Upload Image
items.description: Drag and drop your photo or browse files. Our tool supports JPG, PNG, and WebP formats.

items.title: AI Processing
items.description: The AI intelligently modifies facial expressions while maintaining the integrity of the image.

items.title: Download the Result
items.description: Preview the changes and download your transformed image in high quality.

testimonial.heading: What Our Users Say
testimonial.description: Join the community of enthusiastic users who enhance their photos with WaveSpeed AI

items.name: Emily Davis
items.comment: I love how easily I could change my friend’s expression for our group photo. It made the moment perfect!

items.name: James Smith
items.comment: As a photographer, this tool has revolutionized the way I present emotions in my portraits.

items.name: Lisa Brown
items.comment: The ability to personalize expressions is incredible! It’s my go-to for creative photo edits.

faq.heading: Frequently Asked Questions
faq.description: Get answers to common inquiries about expression transfer technology

items.title: What kinds of expressions can be modified with this feature?
items.description: You can modify a broad range of expressions such as smiles, frowns, excitement, and seriousness. The AI is designed to recognize and accurately alter these emotional cues.

items.title: Is this tool free to use?
items.description: Absolutely! Each user gets 30 free credits daily, perfect for transforming multiple images. Additional credits can be earned through engagement methods like surveys and challenges.

items.title: Can I use the modified images commercially?
items.description: Commercial use is allowed for paid users under any subscription plan. Free-tier users can use the modified content for personal projects only.

items.title: How is my privacy protected?
items.description: All processing happens locally in your browser, ensuring that your images are never uploaded or stored on our servers, maintaining complete privacy.

footer.heading: Ready to Change Expressions in Your Photos?
footer.description: Try WaveSpeed AI now and discover the difference. No sign-up required.
